Package Custom_CollectionsED.trees.binary.avl

Class AVLTree<T>

java.lang.Object
Custom_CollectionsED.trees.binary.binaryLinkedTree.LinkedBinaryTree<T>
Custom_CollectionsED.trees.binary.avl.AVLTree<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the data type to be stored int heis tree, must be comparable
All Implemented Interfaces:
BinaryTreeADT<T>
public class AVLTree<T> extends LinkedBinaryTree<T>
This class is the implementation of an AVL tree, and extends the LinkedBinaryTree abstract class

    • updateHeight

      public void updateHeight(BinaryTreeNode<T> node)
      Updates the height of a given node based on the heights of its left and right children.

      node - the node for which to update the height

    • height

      public int height(BinaryTreeNode<T> node)
      Returns the height of the given node.
      Parameters:
      node - the node for which to retrieve the height
      Returns:
      the height of the node or -1 if the node is null

    • getBalance

      public int getBalance(BinaryTreeNode<T> node)
      Calculates and returns the balance factor of a given node, which is the difference between the height of the right subtree and the height of the left subtree.
      Parameters:
      node - the node for which to calculate the balance factor
      Returns:
      the balance factor of the node

    • insertElement

      public void insertElement(T targetElement)
      Inserts a new element into the AVL tree while maintaining the AVL property.
      Parameters:
      targetElement - the element to be inserted

    • removeElement

      public T removeElement(T targetElement)
      Removes the specified element from the AVL tree while maintaining the AVL property.
      Parameters:
      targetElement - the element to be removed
      Returns:
      the removed element or null if the element is not found
